mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule ( s_id, schedule, h_username, block_status, s_notice, s_choice ) VALUES ( schedule_seq.NEXTVAL, #{schedule, jdbcType=DATE}, #{hUsername, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{blockStatus, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{sNotice, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sChoice, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT schedule, h_username, TO_CHAR(schedule, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS schedule_date, TO_CHAR(schedule, 'HH24:MI') AS schedule_time, s_choice FROM schedule WHERE h_username = #{hUsername} AND TO_CHAR(schedule, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = #{date} AND s_choice = #{sChoice} ORDER BY schedule_date, schedule_time
